Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: It really was damn good! The staff are lovely and the location is the perfect place to people-watch. Both the cake and coffee were impeccable so it totally lives up to its name!

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Dam Bad Coffee much? Coke was warm as hell, frappuchino had no taste at all. They have no right being this expensive.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Quiet little joint to enjoy coffee. However, coffee not anything special and quite pricey.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text:
I thought something might be up when I saw the number of syrups on offer to go with the coffee - no, no, no!
The service was totally indifferent. However, by some miracle the flat white was ‚Ä¶

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Ordered a cortado and it was so delicious that I returned the next day for another. The sweets looked yummy and there was plenty of seating outdoors. The location is great for people watching with views of dam square and stinky carriage horses.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Worst coffee ever. Don't go there, rather walk couple minutes and have coffee somewhere else. Ordered a soy latte (that's the only vegan option) we had to leave it there. Couldn't finish it. They served it in a paper cup and it was ‚Ç¨6. They wouldn't even know if they had vegan selection. Big disappointment.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Probably the most expensive coffee I've ever bought in my life, but this is Amsterdam. Besides the tourist-gouging prices, the service was average and uninterested, and the decor was average too.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Coffee was good, but I had better around town for cheaper.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: This place owns up to the name "Dam good coffee." As an American, I'd been searching for a place that served large portion sizes and this place does! My favorite place to get a to-go coffee while I shop.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Damn bad coffee!! Bad service and low quality! We asked for 1 espresso and 1 cappuccino and without asking they charged the big cups. And the cakes were not fresh... therefore we ended up paying 17,50 for the worst coffee experience ever in amsterdam.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Very Nice small Coffee corner with 'Dam' Good Coffee. I realtime like the espresso's. For real Coffee-lovers a MUST TASTE. The barista's are very Nice, had a blast with them!! ;-)

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: i love the New york cheese cake and as well the Carrot Cake. Definitely recommended for everybody visiting Amsterdam

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Five stars because they serve some dam good coffee (For real!)

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Great Frappuccino and waffle, friendly staff. Better than your normal sugar-loaded drink from Starbucks.

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Coffee was really great, location is awesome, but the chairs/tables weren't of high quality. Still a great place to grab a cup of coffee

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: The hot chocolate with Marshmallows and whipped cream looked great I just had it with whipped cream but I could taste those marshmallows hahaha but the hot chocolate was Amazing a big fat 10, I gave my girl my hot chocolate because I love ‚Ä¶

Review Text:

Name: Dam Good Coffee
Review Text: Friendly enough staff but no washroom and the free internet is really just a Facebook account hijack. Coffee is nothing special. Location is nice for people watching.

Review Text: Great location to watch people and see the wide open square.
